resources.string: Your location helps us connect you with your local friends
Wary? Once inside, make a private clan with your friends. Later!
Pick friends and make a private clan
Let everyone know about your clan. You can still send personal invites
Currently you do not have any events to view. Start by creating an event and inviting your friends.
Could not fetch your events. Please try again
Only people who are going to the event can edit it.
The organiser has finalised the event. You cannot edit it now.
You cannot invite other people to the event as you are not going.
People who are not going to the event cannot enter the chat room.
You cannot change the RSVP of an event created by you.
Are you sure you wan\'t to unfinalise this event? Other people will now be able to edit the event.
Are you sure you wan\'t to finalise this event? Other people will not be able to edit the event.
Could not find the location. Please try again.
This location is not available on map.
None of your facebook friends are on the app. Invite people through whatsapp or share the app on facebook.
None of your zonal facebook friends are on the app. Invite people through whatsapp or share the app on facebook.
Could not load your facebook friends. Please try again.
Could not load your phone contacts. Please try again.
None of your zonal phone contacts are on the app. Invite people through whatsapp or share the app on facebook.
Whatsapp is not installed on this device.
Please rate us by selecting a star.
Cannot fetch your messages at the moment. Please try again.
Could not send your message. Please try again.
There are no suggestion to show for this event category.
An event can\'t end before it has even started.
Please choose the timings for your event.
The event is now finalised. No one can make any changes to it.
The event is now not finalised. People going to the event can update it.
Looks like we messed up. Please try again.
Please enter a valid phone number.
Add your number to connect with your local phonebook friends on clanOut for a better experience. Your privacy is important to us, clanOut will never share it with anyone
The event could not be edited as the organiser has already finalised it.
The event could not be finalised. Please try again
The event could not be unfinalised. Please try again
Could not find this event in the list
Looks like there was a problem connecting with facebook. Please try again.
